message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Let me know if that works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm looking to spend a little less. Would you be willing to come down to $10000?
I can see you're interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
